name: phial
description: An app to keep track of time and goals via tasks

scripts.buildsite: cd site && npm i && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.buildcdk: cd cdk && npm i && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run buildsite && npm run buildcdk
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd cdk && npm run deploy

author: nickpale and colefordays
